common.unavailableGuests: Sorry, but guests for present share are unavailable at this moment. Please try later.
common.consoleGreetingMsg: %cHeeey, 🆒. Welcome to Way2Up team's project. Looks like you are a software developer 👨‍💻👩‍💻. We hope your intentions are pure 😈 and you like what we have created 👍🤟🤙🤘👌. Anyway, in case of you find something to improve ⚠️ on this website, we will appreciate, if you tell us about it. In return, you will receive a symbolic gift 🎁 from us. You can just throw us a message 📬 and just talk like a programmer with a programmer 🍻. Thanks for the attention and have fun on our website 🎉😊, make yourself at home 🏠

home.subTitleHappyList: Create your party with gifts and guests
home.paragraphHappyList: Plan your party, create your event, invite your guests, make a wish-list of your gifts and all these completely free of charge
home.inviteGuestsText: via an email or a phone number
home.birthdayWeddingSimilarParagraph: This is the section for creating individual events, like birthday parties, weddings, baby shower and so on. You will be able to invite your guests via SMS or email. You can create a wish list and your guests will be able to choose what they will present you on your special day.
home.secretSantaText: Here you can create a 'Secret Santa' event (also known as 'Gift Exchange'). It's an interesting game mostly played in a group of friends or colleagues during New Year parties.

faq.How To Create An Anniversary Event: How To Create An Anniversary Event
faq.Fill in all the fields of the form: Fill in all the fields in the form. You can come back later and change them if you haven't created the event and haven’t sent the notifications.
faq.Make a list of participants: Make a list of event's participants. You should fill the name and email or mobile number of each participant. This will be the way they will get notification about event invitation. All names should be unique to be clear who is who. Important to use mentioned format of phone number (+374XXYYYYYY). At this moment website is supported only all Armenian mobile operators (apart Karabakh Telecom, for which we are sorry and trying to grow your possibilities in this part). Later you can come back and change this list until you haven't created event and sent notifications.
faq.Make a list of presents you want to rece: Make a list of presents you want to receive. You can add new presents later, remove existing ones or edit them, if nobody has chosen them.
faq.Finalize your event: Finalize your event. After this you will find the created event on the page
faq.After getting invitations to your party: After getting invitations to your party, the guests should accept or decline it. After accepting it, they will be able to see list of other guests and presents, and choose one or several presents from your wish list. It's possible also to choose one present by group of several guests, so you can list expensive presents too, without confusing your guests
faq.How to create a Secret Santa event: How to create a Secret Santa event
faq.Create the event and send the notificati: Create the event and send the notifications
faq.This will finalize your event: button. This will finalize your event and send notifications to all the guests. After this you will not be able to make any changes to the event.
faq.Here are the rules of Secret Santa: Here are the rules of Secret Santa (known also as a Gift Exchange) party, which were taken as a basis while creating this website. Anyway, you can make your changes to fit everything to your needs.
faq.After creating the list of participants: After creating the list of participants (don't forget to add yourself), our system will randomly select who you should prepare a gift for. Each user will get link in the email or SMS. This link will bring the guest to its account (which will be created automatically) where the guest will find the name of his giftee.
faq.Later, during the event, all the gifts s: Later, during the event, all the gifts should be stored in one place (ideally under the New Year Tree). Small folded pieces of paper each containing the name of a participant must be put in a box or a hat.
faq.One of guests must come and take: One of guests must come and take a piece paper from the box and the person mentioned on the paper will must come and choose any gift he likes from the pile (the gifts should be wrapped so that nobody can see what they are), open it and show it to all the participants. Before taking its place, the guest should take another piece of paper from the box and invite a new person to choose a gift.
faq.Here comes the most interesting part: Here comes the most interesting part :). New participant has 2 options. He or she can choose some new present from the pile OR they can to steal some of the presents which are already chosen. In this case the person, whose gift was taken, must come and make the same choice (open a new gift or steal one).
faq.To prevent this process from infinity lo: To prevent this process from infinity loop, some rules must be used. For example the gift can't be stolen more than 3 times.Also it is useful to have a rule which will prevent someone from stealing back the gift which was stolen from him just now.
faq.You are invited to the event, what next: You are invited to the event, what next
faq.You will get an email or an SMS about in: You will get an email or an SMS about invitation. If you are already registered with those credentials, you will see the event after you log in.
faq.What to do if you are a new user: What to do if you are a new user or you already have an account with another email/phone number? In this case you will get an activation link for your account.
faq.Following that link you will find page w: Following that link you will find page with 2 forms. One of them for finalizing your new account by entering 2 passwords. Your username for login will be email or phone number where you receive the invitation with link. The other form is for old users, where you can fill your account's username and password and this new invitation will appear in the list of your events.
faq.Add a new guest or a present after final: Add a new guest or a present after finalizing the event
faq.First, you must login from: First, you must login from a link Login.
faq.Choose the event you want to add a guest: Choose the event you want to add a guest or a present for. It will be listed under the title
faq.To add a new guest you must click on: To add a new guest you must click on
faq.Button and fill the form in the opened p: button and fill the form in the opened popup.
faq.To add a new present you must click on: To add a new present you must click on
faq.Hide the present or the guest from every: Hide the present or the guest from everybody
faq.If you are an event creator: If you are an event creator
faq.Choose the event where you want to hide: Choose the event where you want to a present or a guest. It will be listed under the title
faq.To make a guest hidden you must click on: To make a guest hidden you must click on
faq.After this no one will be able to see th: title. After this no one will be able to see this guest in their guest list or present they have chosen. By clicking once more time on same checkbox, this guest will once more become visible.
faq.For hiding a choice of a present you sho: For hiding a choice of a present you should click on
faq.After this no one will be able to see: title. After this no one will be able to see who has chosen this present. By clicking once more the same checkbox, this present with its owner will become visible once again.
faq.To hide yourself from other guests in a: To hide yourself from other guests in a particular event you must find that event in a list of events under
faq.checkbox in that row. After this no one: checkbox in that row. After this no one (except the event creator) will be able to see you in their guest list or the present you have chosen. By clicking once more on the same checkbox, you will become visible again.
faq.To make your choice of present hidden, y: To make your choice of present hidden, you must click on
faq.button in appropriate row of event under: button in appropriate row of event under
faq.title. In the new page you should find t: title. In the new page you should find the present you want to hide under
faq.checkbox in same row. After this no one: checkbox in same row. After this no one will be able to see that you have chosen this present (even the creator of event). By clicking once more on the same checkbox, your choice will become visible again.
faq.If you are a member of a group present,: If you are a member of a group present, then anyone in your group can make that gift hidden or visible. Reach an agreement about this with other guests in your group before changing visibility of the present.

createEvent.title: Create event
createEvent.secret_santa_description: Here you can create a 'Secret Santa' event (also known as 'Gift Exchange'). It's an interesting game mostly played in a group of friends or colleagues during New Year parties. For more information about the event
createEvent.anniversary_description: This is the section for creating individual events, like anniversaries, weddings and so on. You will be able to invite your guests via SMS or email. You can create a wish list and your guests will be able to choose what they will gift you on your special day. For more information
createEvent.create_private_party: Lets start creating your private party
createEvent.create_ss: Lets start creating your Secret Santa party!
createEvent.The name field is required: The Event name field is required.
createEvent.The location field is required: The Event location field is required.
createEvent.anniversary_add_guest: Add the guest to the list
createEvent.The guest_contact field is required: The email / phone number field is required.
createEvent.The guest_contact value is not valid: The email / phone number must be either a valid phone number (+374XXOOOOOO) or e-mail
createEvent.secret-santa_show_more_guest: Show one more participant | Show {guests_count} more participants
createEvent.anniversary_show_more_guest: Show one more guest | Show {guests_count} more guests
createEvent.show_more_present: Show one more present | Show {presents_count} more presents
createEvent.The present_name field is required: The Present name field is required.
createEvent.The present_name field may not be greate: The Present name field may not be greater than 50 characters.
createEvent.The present_link field is not a valid UR: The Present link field is not a valid URL.
createEvent.The present_description field may not be: The Present description field may not be greater than 191 characters.
createEvent.The presentImage field must be an image: The ADD PRESENT IMAGE field must be an image.
createEvent.present_not_added: The present has not been added yet!
createEvent.event_success_created_msg: Create this event by sending or not sending the invitations. Later you will be able to send invitations, make changes in guests and gifts lists.
createEvent.ss_success_created_msg: Invite everybody now (you will not be able to edit list of participants), or invite later (when list of participants will be done)
createEvent.not_send_invitations: but do not send the invitations
createEvent.invitation_link_description: This action is not necessary, since after completing all the steps you will receive a link by clicking on which your friends can be added to the guest list of your event.
createEvent.form_error_msg: Please fill in all required fields!
createEvent.invite_link_info: Copy the link and share with your friends to join your event.
createEvent.min_participants_msg: The number of participants must be more than 2.
createEvent.The contact field is required: The Email / Phone Number field is required
createEvent.The contact value is not valid: The Email / Phone Number must be either a valid phone number (+374XXOOOOOO) or e-mail
createEvent.add_yourself_err_msg: You need to add yourself for sure!
createEvent.yourself_error: He-he, no need to invite yourself! 🤣 🤣

home.title: Event planner for birthdays, weddings, secret santa
home.description: Free service for planning events like birthdays, weddings, baby-shower, secret santa with creating wish list and guests list. Send invitations to guests.
